Plot: A young girl's "sweet sixteenth" birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.
Title: Sixteen Candles
Actors: Molly Ringwald, Justin Henry, Michael Schoeffling, Haviland Morris
tomatoConsensus: Significantly more mature than the teen raunch comedies that defined the era, Sixteen Candles is shot with compassion and clear respect for his characters and their hang-ups.
